SYSTEM_STARTUP_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when Volumio starts
SYSTEM_SHUTDOWN_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when Volumio shuts down
MUSIC_PLAY_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when music plays
MUSIC_PAUSE_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when music pauses
MUSIC_STOP_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when the music stops
MUTE_ON_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when volume is muted
MUTE_OFF_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when volume is unmuted
RANDOM_ON_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when random playback is turned on
RANDOM_OFF_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when random playback is turned off
REPEAT_ON_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat mode (all or single) is turned on
REPEAT_OFF_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat mode (all or single) is turned off
REPEAT_ALL_ON_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat-all mode is turned on
REPEAT_ALL_OFF_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat-all mode is turned off
REPEAT_SINGLE_ON_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat-single mode is turned on
REPEAT_SINGLE_OFF_DOC: Set the state of a GPIO pin when repeat-single mode is turned off
GPIO_PIN_DOC: The GPIO pin you wish to control
GPIO_STATE_DOC: The state you wish to set the GPIO pin
GPIO_DELAY_DOC: How long to wait before setting the GPIO state
GPIO_DURATION_DOC: How long to keep the GPIO at this state
